articles.title: With attrition levels easing, IT firms say goodbye to the Great resignation - BusinessLine
articles.description: Attrition in large-cap IT firms has returned to pre-pandemic levels as techies face fewer opportunities. Q2FY24 saw TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech and Wipro report attrition levels of 14.9%, 14.6%, 14.2% and 15.5%, respectively. The pandemic had opened new avenues fo…
articles.content:
Attrition for large-cap IT firms has gone down to normalcy as pandemic induced opportunities for techies are dwindling in the software industry.
